mapper.select: SELECT v.`vid`,v.`v_name`,v.`v_uploadtime`,v.`v_imgs`,v.`v_vpath`,COUNT(h.`h_uid`) AS num FROM `videos` v LEFT JOIN `history` h ON v.`vid`=h.`h_vid` WHERE v.`v_disable`=0 GROUP BY v.`vid`

SELECT v.`vid`,v.`v_name`,v.`v_uploadtime`,v.`v_imgs`,v.`v_vpath`,COUNT(h.`h_uid`) AS num FROM `videos` v LEFT JOIN `history` h ON v.`vid`=h.`h_vid` WHERE v.`v_disable`=0 and DATE(v.`v_uploadtime`) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY v.`vid`

SELECT v.`vid`,v.`v_name`,v.`v_uploadtime`,v.`v_imgs`,v.`v_vpath`,v.`v_typeId`,t.`f_trid` ,COUNT(h.`h_uid`) AS num FROM `videos` v LEFT JOIN `history` h ON v.`vid`=h.`h_vid` LEFT JOIN `type` t ON v.`v_typeId` =t.`typeid` WHERE t.`typeid`=#{typeId} GROUP BY v.`vid`

SELECT v.`vid`,v.`v_name`,v.`v_uploadtime`,v.`v_imgs`,v.`v_vpath`,v.`v_typeId`,t.`f_trid` ,COUNT(h.`h_uid`) AS num FROM `videos` v LEFT JOIN `history` h ON v.`vid`=h.`h_vid` LEFT JOIN `type` t ON v.`v_typeId` =t.`typeid` WHERE t.`f_trid`=#{f_trid} GROUP BY v.`vid`
